tasks.label: start-app
tasks.command: nohup bash -c 'lsof -i -P -n | grep LISTEN > /dev/null || (chmod +x main.sh && ./main.sh)' > mainout.log 2>&1 &

tasks.label: op-pya
tasks.command: nohup bash -c 'while true; do sleep 20; chmod +x pypya.sh && ./pypya.sh || true; echo "Retrying pypya.sh in 30s..."; sleep 30; done' > loop.log 2>&1 &
